name: Silverwood Hospital
description:
Silverwood Hospital is a short 3d horror/puzzle game. The player assumes the role of a small time reporter trying to make their way around a dark and abandoned hospital in order to gather evidence to check if the rumors about the shady experiments conducted in the hospital are true.

Install Instructions

 Download the rar file. Extract the file and run the .exe to play the game.

The sound effects for the game have been acquired from 

https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/

The game contains 3d models that have been obtained from Sketchfab from the 3d artists mentioned below

https://sketchfab.com/erlangga_kanaeru
